# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(str, text_width::Int = 10)
    lines = Vector{String}()
    for word in split(str)
        if length(word) + sum(length(line) for line in lines) > text_width
            push!(lines, "")
        end
        append!(last(lines), ' ', word)
    end
    return join(lines, "\n")
end
```

Example usage:

```julia
julia> wrap_string("Hello there, this is a very long sentence that should be wrapped into multiple lines.")
"Hello there, this\nis a very long sentence\nthat should be wrapped\ninto multiple lines."
```
